text: Hello! How are you today?
Pretty good for a Tuesday. And yourself?
I'm doing well.
I'm glad to hear that. Where do you live? I am in Austin, TX.
I'm in a small town in Iowa outside of the quad cities. Have you ever heard of a charity called Save the Children?
I can't say that I have heard of that particular non-profit, but it sounds interesting. Is that charity something you feel passionate about?

It's an amazing organization that does a lot of work internationally. It's a non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That sounds like a great cause. How can I help?
That's so awesome that you want to help out! You can choose to donate any amount of the task payment, $0-$2 or anything in between. How much would you like to donate to the charity now?
$2 for me, please
Thank you so much! The children will benefit so greatly from your donation
Cool, no prob. I work in philanthropy, so it is important.
That's awesome. Any charity or group that I would know?
Probably -- I work in Higher Ed, for my alma mater. #HookEm
Gotcha. I went to Kansas so Rock Chalk! ha
:) It's a really great uni, but of course, I am highly biased. I want more people to be able to go here.
I agree. Its getting so expensive now days that it seems like the trend isn't to go to college anymore but more a trade school
And that's okay, too. For the best and brightest, there should always be the 40 Acres.

I agree. Everyone's path is different but I think going to a big school offers those who have no clue what to do a good place to find out, or if they know exactly what they want they can pick the best program
Agreed. We've done a lot better here, diversifying our programs and adding interdisciplinary studies. I'm sort of envious of the college kids of today.
That sounds like a great deal. I appreciate that chatting and the donation. Keep up the philanthropic work!
Again, no problem. Best of luck in your own endeavors!
